name: By-Poloss..-..CVE-2026-0920
description: CVE-2026-0920 — Unauthenticated privilege escalation vulnerability in the LA-Studio Element Kit for Elementor WordPress plugin (≤ 1.5.6.3). The ajax_register_handle function fails to restrict user role assignment, allowing attackers to register accounts with the administrator role via the lakit_bkrole parameter, resulting in full site takeover.
